title: Impact Challenge Icon
body: Hey guys, been a day almost since i donated , how long does it take to get the email for the icon ?

replies.body:
This is copy pasted from the support ticket I sent in:

_Thanks for reaching out and for supporting four amazing causes! Here’s an update on your perk. We’ll be emailing you the code for the in-game icon and instructions on how to redeem it by the end of the campaign, which ends November 12.

Keep an eye out as we might get it to you sooner than that, and please let us know if you have any other questions._
